The patch contains also a style change, which works fine with FF3 and IE7.

author: dhruba
msg: Added TestSerDe so that unit tests can run successfully.

author: jukka
msg: JCR-1813: Invalid journal records during XATransactions
Only update the repository in an XA transaction if there actually are repository changes within that transaction.

author: jukka
msg: Hmm, the namespace cache I restored actually wasn't repository-level but per-session, which caused a test failure.

In fact, with the current SPI RepositoryService design it's impossible to do a proper repository-level namespace cache without making extra assumptions about the repository as all the namespace methods in RepositoryService take a SessionInfo argument.
